sentences.english: I used to do weight training years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我多年前曾进行过举重训练。

detailed_translations.english: Weight training is a kind of physical exercise in which people lift or push heavy weights with their arms and legs in order to strengthen their muscles

sentences.english: Since we shared the same body-building class, I have been treating you as one of my good friends.
sentences.chinese: 自从我们上了健身俱乐部的课以后，我就一直把你当成好朋友。

sentences.english: People are now attaching greater importance to quality of life, with travel, body-building and beauty treatment becoming an indispensable part of their concerns.
sentences.chinese: 人们越来越看重生活品质，旅游、健身、美容等休闲活动已成为人们生活中不可缺少的部分。

detailed_translations.english: Bodybuilding is the activity of doing special exercises regularly in order to make your muscles grow bigger

sentences.english: It seems like whenever I get into a really good running groove, I come down with a cold that forces me to slow down my training.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，在任何时候我都可以进入到一个跑步的最佳状态，可是，我染上了一个感冒让我减低了我的训练力度。

detailed_translations.english: a treatment for pain and disease that involves pressing your hands on particular parts of the body

sentences.english: Alex massaged Helena’s aching back.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯给海伦娜疼痛的背部做了推拿。

detailed_translations.english: to press and rub someone’s body with your hands, to help them relax or to reduce pain in their muscles
the action of pressing and rubbing someone’s body with your hands, to help them relax or to reduce pain in their muscles or joints

sentences.english: His eyes shifted to the prone body on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他的视线移向了趴在地上的尸体。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易于…的， 很有可能…的； 俯卧的
detailed_translations.english: likely to do something or suffer from something, especially something bad or harmful

sentences.english: He’s a very picky eater .
sentences.chinese: 他很挑食。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is picky only likes particular things and not others, and so is not easy to please

sentences.english: When I finally found my bearings, I was standing on Congress avenue, out of breath, smeared up and down with grass stains and dog shit.
sentences.chinese: 当我终于能确定方向时，我发现自己在国会大街上，上气不接下气，草渍和狗屎全身都是。

sentences.english: He exerted preterhuman self-denial in abstaining from finishing him completely; but getting out of breath he finally desisted, and dragged the apparently inanimate body on to the settle.
sentences.chinese: 他使出超人的自制力克制自己，才没有送他的命，可是他终于喘不过气来，罢手了，又把那显然已无生气的身体拖到高背椅子旁边。

sentences.english: the four main acupuncture points
sentences.chinese: 四大穴位

detailed_translations.chinese: 针刺；[中医] 针刺疗法
detailed_translations.english: a treatment for pain and disease that involves pushing special needles into parts of the body

sentences.english: (It's worth noting that while Bhutto was generally well-liked in India, she was seen there as an ineffective and weak politician).
sentences.chinese: （值得注意的是，虽然贝布托在印度受到爱戴，但她还是被认为是一个低效的孱弱的政治家）。

sentences.english: Adrian spent a sleepless night wondering what to do.
sentences.chinese: 阿德里安一夜未眠，在想该怎么办。

detailed_translations.chinese: 失眠的；不休息的；警觉的；永不停息的
detailed_translations.english: a night when you are unable to sleep

sentences.english: I don’t know how you can be so laid-back about your exams.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白你对考试怎么会如此不在乎。

detailed_translations.english: relaxed and seeming not to be worried about anything

sentences.english: “The bottom line question to ask is, Is your forgetfulness fundamentally interfering with how you function?
sentences.chinese: "要问的底线问题是,你的健忘是否真的根本性地妨碍了你的行动?"

sentences.english: Health experts say that stress can come with some pretty surprising symptoms—from forgetfulness to nausea to skin rashes.
sentences.chinese: 健康专家们认为压力会伴随着许多令人惊讶的征兆而来——从健忘到恶心，甚至是皮疹。

sentences.english: “Most people when they turn 50 begin to look at forgetfulness with more seriousness, ” said Dr. Gene Cohen, the director of the Center for Aging, Health and Humanities at George Washington University.
sentences.chinese: "大多数人们步入50岁后便开始严肃地看待健忘这个问题了,"乔治华盛顿大学人类老化,健康及人类研究中心的吉恩柯翰博士说.

sentences.english: Overall they experienced the same stress-reducing effects of the brisk walkers. Better yet, the effects were evident immediately.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说他们与轻快步行的那组压力减轻的程度是相同的，但前者的见效更快。

sentences.english: People who are new to wellness usually are introduced to one part of this triangle such as exercise, diet or stress-reducing practices (meditation).
sentences.chinese: 刚刚接受健康教育的人们通常是先接触“健康三角”的一个方面，比如：锻炼身体，调节饮食，或者练习减压（默想）。

sentences.english: Realise you need to be systematic to make it work or you just escalate your disorganisation.
sentences.chinese: 必须有系统条理性地让工作进行，不然你只是在加剧工作的混乱度。

sentences.english: I think he’s being unreasonable.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他是在无理取闹。

detailed_translations.english: not fair or sensible

sentences.english: A 50% market share is achievable.
sentences.chinese: 百分之五十的市场占有率是可实现的。

sentences.english: It is often a good idea to start with smaller, easily achievable goals.
sentences.chinese: 以较小的、容易实现的目标来做开端经常是个好主意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的
detailed_translations.english: If you say that something you are trying to do is achievable, you mean that it is possible for you to succeed in doing it

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

sentences.english: I do yoga twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 我一周做两次瑜伽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术
detailed_translations.english: a system of exercises that help you control your mind and body in order to relax

sentences.english: Drugs helped to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 药物有助于舒缓疼痛。

sentences.english: A secretary was hired to relieve her of some of the administrative work.
sentences.chinese: 一个秘书被雇来为她减轻一些行政工作的负担。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

sentences.english: Because I want to inspire, motivate, and “unblock” writers so that they can follow their passion with greater ease.
sentences.chinese: 因为我想激发，鼓励作者们，解除他们的障碍，以便让他们能够更轻松随性的创作。

sentences.english: The water in the tank is constantly filtered.
sentences.chinese: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.english: The ozone layer filters harmful UV rays from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 臭氧层过滤掉有害的太阳紫外线。

sentences.english: coffee filter papers
sentences.chinese: 咖啡滤纸

sentences.english: filter cigarettes (= with a filter at the end )
sentences.chinese: 过滤嘴香烟

detailed_translations.english: to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
something that you pass water, air etc through in order to remove unwanted substances and make it clean or suitable to use

sentences.english: And at last came this inner shift not as a decision of mine but as a spontaneous change of belief about myself, a deep reconciliation and peacefulness.
sentences.chinese: 这样的内在转变最后所以发生并非我作出的决定，它是一种自然发生的，自我信念上的转变，是一种深刻的和解与平静。

sentences.english: No one else leant over her, and whispered soothing words to her, or was near enough to hear the flutter of her beating heart.
sentences.chinese: 没有其他任何人向她弯下身去，低声地对她说些安慰的话，或跟她挨得很近，可以听到她颤动的心房正在怦怦地跳动。

sentences.english: He offered soothing words about the value of the French model in the recession and its ability to protect the most vulnerable from poverty.
sentences.chinese: 对于衰退中法兰西模式的价值，以及保护绝大多数易受伤害的贫困人口的能力，他给予了安慰。

sentences.english: an unwanted pregnancy
sentences.chinese: 非意愿怀孕

detailed_translations.english: not wanted or needed

sentences.english: The drains flooded and water overflowed down the main street.
sentences.chinese: 下水道被淹，水溢到了大街上。

sentences.english: The river had overflowed its banks.
sentences.chinese: 河水漫堤了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 满得外溢，外流，泛滥；充满，洋溢
detailed_translations.english: if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges

detailed_translations.chinese: 淹没， 从…中溢出， 多得无法容纳
detailed_translations.english: if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges

detailed_translations.chinese: 容纳不下的物； 溢出， 满出； 溢流口， 溢流管
detailed_translations.english: the amount of something or the number of people that cannot be contained in a place because it is already full

sentences.english: Her skin felt smooth and cool.
sentences.chinese: 她的皮肤摸上去又滑又凉。

sentences.english: a smooth pebble
sentences.chinese: 光滑的卵石

sentences.english: The stone steps had been worn smooth .
sentences.chinese: 石阶被磨得光溜溜的了。

sentences.english: She stood up and smoothed down her frock.
sentences.chinese: 她站了起来，抚平了自己的连衣裙。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth surface has no rough parts, lumps, or holes, especially in a way that is pleasant and attractive to touch

detailed_translations.chinese: 使光滑；消除（障碍等）；使优雅；缓和
detailed_translations.english: to make a rough surface flat and even
If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat

sentences.english: He ruffled her hair affectionately.
sentences.chinese: 他亲昵地拨弄她的头发。

sentences.english: A light wind ruffled the water.
sentences.chinese: 一阵轻风吹皱了水面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄皱；触怒；扰乱；迅速翻动
detailed_translations.english: to make a smooth surface uneven

detailed_translations.chinese: 皱褶；生气；混乱；连续轻敲声

sentences.english: He flushed the drain.
sentences.chinese: 他用水冲排水沟。

sentences.english: The boat drifted helplessly along the drain until some people saw him.
sentences.chinese: 船儿无助地顺着排水沟漂流直到有人看见他。

detailed_translations.english: something that continuously uses a lot of time, money etc

sentences.english: The road toll scheme was dismissed as impractical.
sentences.chinese: 公路收费计划由于不切实际而遭到否定。

sentences.english: James was a foolish man, full of impractical plans.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯是个愚蠢的人，满脑子都是不切实际的计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不切实际的，不现实的；不能实行的
detailed_translations.english: not sensible or possible for practical reasons

sentences.english: The universe is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙是无限的。

detailed_translations.english: without limits in space or time

sentences.english: The sky, swollen like a black bladder, rumbled and crackled.
sentences.chinese: 天空胀得像个黑色的气囊，发出隆隆声和劈啪声。

detailed_translations.english: If something rumbles, it makes a low, continuous noise
a series of long low sounds

sentences.english: Could you get rid of some of that clutter in your bedroom?
sentences.chinese: 你能把你卧室那些杂物清理掉一些吗？

detailed_translations.english: a large number of things that are scattered somewhere in an untidy way
to cover or fill a space or room with too many things, so that it looks very untidy

name: dispose
trans: 处理（尤指难处理的东西）

sentences.english: Chinese vases are disposed around the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 中国花瓶摆放在展馆四周。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange things or put them in their places

sentences.english: ...herbal remedies for colds.
sentences.chinese: …感冒的草药疗法。

detailed_translations.english: Herbal means made from or using herbs

detailed_translations.chinese: 草本植物志； 药草书

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

sentences.english: We have stopped making desktops because no one is making money from them.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经停止生产台式电脑了，因为不赚钱。

detailed_translations.english: the main area on a computer where you can find the  icon s  that represent programs, and where you can do things to manage the information on the computer

sentences.english: Also if you are bringing your breast pump on the airplane, remember to take the icepack out first and put it into the luggage that you will check.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把吸奶器带上飞机，记得先把冰袋拿出来，把它放到需要进行安检的行李中。

sentences.english: a balmy summer night
sentences.chinese: 一个宜人的夏夜

detailed_translations.english: balmy air, weather etc is warm and pleasant

sentences.english: His friendship was the one thing that made life bearable.
sentences.chinese: 有他的友情在，生活还可以过下去。

detailed_translations.english: something that is bearable is difficult or unpleasant, but you can deal with it

sentences.english: You’ll find their uniforms tend to be more subdued pastel colours, such as mauve, green or blue.
sentences.chinese: 你会发现，他们的制服往往是较柔和的淡色彩，例如淡紫色、绿色或蓝色。

sentences.english: The ladies who you work for, after they sob for hourson end, make them use blue or mauve eyeliner to make their bloodshot eyes lookwhiter.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的女雇主一连抽泣了几小时，就让她们用蓝色或是淡紫色的眼线，这能让充了血的眼睛看起来白一点。

sentences.english: The flowers are pearly mauve.
sentences.chinese: 花朵是珍珠般的淡紫色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 淡紫色；苯胺紫；淡紫色染料
detailed_translations.english: a pale purple colour

sentences.english: I bathed, washed my hair, and got dressed.
sentences.chinese: 我洗了澡，洗了头，然后穿上衣服。

sentences.english: He bathed the children and put them to bed.
sentences.chinese: 他给孩子们洗了澡，然后把他们弄上床。

sentences.english: They bathed in the lake in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 月光下，他们在湖里游泳。

sentences.english: She brought a bowl of water and began to bathe the injured arm.
sentences.chinese: 她拿来一盆水，开始清洗受伤的手臂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗澡；给…洗；游泳；浸洗; 浸泡
detailed_translations.english: to wash yourself or someone else in a bath

sentences.english: Protesters tried to break through a police cordon.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者们试图冲破警察的封锁线。

detailed_translations.english: If you break through a barrier, you succeed in forcing your way through it

sentences.english: Obese people tend to have higher blood pressure than lean people.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖的人往往比瘦人血压高。

detailed_translations.english: very fat in a way that is unhealthy

sentences.english: The government was unable to curb the excesses of the secret police.
sentences.chinese: 政府无法约束秘密警察的过分行为。

sentences.english: the worst excesses of journalism
sentences.chinese: 新闻工作中那些最糟糕的越轨行为

detailed_translations.english: harmful actions that are socially or morally unacceptable

sentences.english: a naive young girl
sentences.chinese: 天真的小女孩

sentences.english: Jim can be so naive sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆有时候非常幼稚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幼稚的； 天真的； 轻信的
detailed_translations.english: not having much experience of how complicated life is, so that you trust people too much and believe that good things will always happen

sentences.english: an exceptional student
sentences.chinese: 出类拔萃的学生

sentences.english: A review panel concluded that there were no exceptional circumstances that would warrant a lesser penalty for him.
sentences.chinese: 一个评估小组作出结论：没有什么例外情况可使他获得从轻惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: unusually good

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

sentences.english: The twelve finalists will be listed in the Sunday Times.
sentences.chinese: 这12位决赛者的名单将刊登在《星期日泰晤士报》上。

detailed_translations.english: one of the people or teams that reaches the final game in a competition

sentences.english: It seemed impossible that anyone could endure such pain.
sentences.chinese: 似乎谁都不可能忍受这样的疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a difficult or painful situation for a long time without complaining

sentences.english: a wildlife refuge
sentences.chinese: 野生动物保护区

detailed_translations.english: shelter or protection from someone or something

sentences.english: cost overruns of £2 billion
sentences.chinese: 20亿英镑的超额费用

detailed_translations.english: Overrun is also a noun
if unwanted things or people overrun a place, they spread over it in great numbers

sentences.english: a teenage boy
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的少年

sentences.english: my teenage daughter
sentences.chinese: 我那十多岁的女儿

detailed_translations.english: aged between 13 and 19

sentences.english: Some investigators regarded her as the brains of the gang.
sentences.chinese: 一些调查人员认为她是团伙的决策者。

sentences.english: The language angel hanged up the gang and banged them at the angle of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 语言天使举起了一伙人并把他们猛撞到三角形的一个角上。

detailed_translations.english: a group of criminals who work together

sentences.english: He was wrong, and courageous enough to admit it.
sentences.chinese: 他是错了，而且有勇气承认自己错了。

sentences.english: a courageous decision
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的决定

detailed_translations.english: brave

sentences.english: ...an antique dealer.
sentences.chinese: …一位古董商。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and sells a particular product, especially an expensive one

sentences.english: But I think both can coexist.
sentences.chinese: 但是我认为两者可以共存。

sentences.english: In fact, both do coexist.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，两者是共存的。

sentences.english: We must coexist with them, but not let them take us over.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须与之共存，但不要让它们将我们压垮。

detailed_translations.english: if two different things coexist, they exist at the same time or in the same place

sentences.english: Getting the rebels to disarm will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 要让叛乱分子解除武装并非易事。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce the size of your army, navy etc, and the number of your weapons

sentences.english: The ship hit a sandbank.
sentences.chinese: 船撞到了沙堤。

detailed_translations.english: a raised area of sand in a river, ocean etc

sentences.english: When others check in their code, you will see it as incoming to your workspace.
sentences.chinese: 当其他人核查他们的代码时，您将看到它像引入您的工作空间一样。

sentences.english: Reject no incoming request, regardless of the impact they may have on service level agreements.
sentences.chinese: 不拒绝任何传入的请求，不管它们会对服务水平协议产生什么影响。

sentences.english: You can see how using this mechanism enables you to influence the behavior of the ESB, and how it handles incoming requests based on policy definitions you store in the registry.
sentences.chinese: 您可以看到使用此机制如何使您能够影响 ESB 的行为，以及它如何基于您存储在注册中心的策略定义对传入请求进行处理。

sentences.english: Is the tide going out or coming in ?
sentences.chinese: 现在是退潮还是涨潮？

sentences.english: We went for a walk and got cut off by the tide .
sentences.chinese: 我们去散步，结果被潮水困住了。

detailed_translations.english: the regular rising and falling of the level of the sea

sentences.english: the Coastguard station at Stornoway
sentences.chinese: 位于斯托诺韦的海岸警卫队驻地

sentences.english: Contact the Coastguard immediately if you see a boat in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 如看到船只遇险，请立即通知海岸警卫队。

detailed_translations.english: the organization that helps swimmers and ships that are in danger and helps to prevent illegal activities around the coast
